descriptionHtml:
This is a little mod that replaces the sound of the Nirnroot by a guy who sings LOLELOL (LOLELOL cames from a french video :

[youtube]_ghgW_tSPAI[/youtube]
Go to 31m16s to see the right moment !)


To install this mod, extract the rar file and put it in your "Data" file. And that's it !

This is my first mod on Nexus ! Hope you'll enjoy ! :D

Also, in this video of a guys playing Skyrim with tons of stupid mods, we can hear at 5m04s the LOLELOLroot ! :D

[youtube]vMFMCqRkuAA[/youtube]

Oh, and I'm French so excuse me if there are some grammatical mistakes or something :/
Si toi aussi tu es français, passe faire un tour sur ma chaîne YouTube !
http://www.youtube.com/Tocram2
author: Tocram2
